html:
Etymology 1[edit]

See allegō.

Verb[edit]

adlegō (present infinitive adlegere, perfect active adlēgī, supine adlēctum); third conjugation

  1. Alternative form of allegō
Conjugation[edit]

Etymology 2[edit]

See allēgō.

Verb[edit]

adlēgō (present infinitive adlēgāre, perfect active adlēgāvī, supine adlēgātum); first conjugation

  1. Alternative form of allēgō
Conjugation[edit]
